translation.en: It's 75 degrees in sunny San Diego,
translation.es: Hace 23 grados en la soleada San Diego,

translation.en: and the number one song of the day is still Blush by Koop.
translation.es: y la canción número uno sigue siendo Blush de Koop.

translation.en: I feel your eyes on me
You should know better…
Whoo!
You put on the pressure
Something tells me I, I should not let go…
translation.es: Algo me dice que no debería soltar.

translation.en: Whoo! It's my birthday! It's my birthday!
translation.es: Algo me dice que no sé… ¡Es mi cumpleaños!

translation.en: I've been working hard…
translation.es: Me esforcé mucho para que veas

translation.en: Whoo! Here we go! Here we go! Here we go!
translation.es: Me esforcé mucho para que veas lo que me provocas…

translation.en: Yeah! Whoo!
It's an impromptu dance party with my best friend since first grade!
translation.es: ¡Baile improvisado con mi mejor amiga desde primer grado!

translation.en: - Because it's your birthday! -
Go, go. Work, work. Drop it low. Oh.
I love this song, but I'm very hungry.
Okay, I need your help.
Question. What do you think? Quarter- life chic? Or quarter- life crisis?
translation.es: Necesito tu ayuda. Pregunta: ¿qué opinas? ¿Festejo o crisis de los 25?

translation.en: Huh. Well, right now, you're matching the lamp, so…
translation.es: Combinas con la lámpara, así que…

translation.en: - Would a hat help? - No.
Rude!
- Here. - Thank you.
Okay, for my Cassie- palooza kickoff night, we are gonna start off at the club
translation.es: Bien, la primera noche del Cassie-palooza será en la discoteca.

translation.en: where I've spent all afternoon decorating the VIP area.
translation.es: Pasé toda la tarde decorando la zona vip.

translation.en: - Hey, I have this crazy idea. - I'm listening.
translation.es: - Tuve una idea loca. - Te escucho.

translation.en: Instead of going out for your birthday, what if we just stay home,
translation.es: En lugar de salir, ¿qué tal si nos quedamos en casa,

translation.en: and we put on our stretchy pants, and we puzzle like we used to,
translation.es: nos ponemos los pantalones elásticos, hacemos rompecabezas como antes

translation.en: and we order more noodles?
No, no. We're not staying in. It's my birthday week.
translation.es: No. Es la semana de mi cumpleaños.

translation.en: I have to ring in 25 with style!
You've rung in the past four years with style. One night in won't kill you.
translation.es: Lo hiciste los últimos cuatro años. Una noche no te matará.

translation.en: Besides, we haven't puzzled in weeks. I mean, look at Mona.
translation.es: Hace semanas que no hacemos rompecabezas. Mira a Mona. Le falta la sonrisa, y es deprimente.

translation.en: She is missing her smile, and it's kind of depressing.
translation.es: Mira a Mona. Le falta la sonrisa, y es deprimente.

translation.en: I'm not bailing on my kickoff party. It is tradition. My friends expect this.
translation.es: No faltaré a mi fiesta. Es tradición. Mis amigos esperan esto.

translation.en: Well, your best friend has a huge week ahead of her.
translation.es: A mí me espera una gran semana.

translation.en: I was just added as one of the junior research assistants on a team studying marsupial fossil teeth.
translation.es: Seré asistente de investigación en un estudio de fósiles marsupiales.

translation.en: I don't fully understand what that means, but congratulations!
translation.es: No entiendo bien lo que significa, pero ¡felicitaciones!

translation.en: I'm one of three assistants, so it's really not a big--
translation.es: Soy una de tres, así que no es gran cosa…

translation.en: No, no! It is a big deal. You should celebrate.
Because guess what? Tonight is…  …a celebration!
translation.es: Porque ¿adivina qué? ¡Esta noche es una celebración!

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna go change. Again.
translation.es: Me cambiaré de nuevo. Tú también.

translation.en: So should you. Tonight'll be fun, I promise. We leave in an hour- ish.
translation.es: Nos divertiremos, lo prometo. Nos vamos en una hora.

translation.en: Love you, my bestie since we were six!
translation.es: Te amo, mejor amiga desde los seis.

translation.en: Okay.
Whoo! Did I tell you how cute you look by the way? Uh, yeah, I think you did, like, 19 times. Got it.
translation.es: - ¿Te dije lo linda que estás? - Sí, unas 19 veces. Entendí.

translation.en: Good. I meant it every single time. You look adorable.
translation.es: Lo dije en serio cada vez. Te ves adorable.

translation.en: - I love this dress on you. - Thank you. So, who's coming tonight?
Okay. So Kayla's coming. Maddie's coming.
Moving in?
Oh, hi.
Of course you're moving in. I don't know why I just said that.
translation.es: Claro que te mudas. No sé por qué dije eso.

translation.en: Hi, we're your neighbors.
I'm Cassie, and my quiet but highly intelligent roommate is--
translation.es: Soy Cassie, y mi tímida pero brillante amiga es…

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa.
Um, I'm around dinosaur bones all day,
so I'm not really used to talking to people that much.
translation.es: No estoy acostumbrada a hablar con gente.

translation.en: - Right. - Works in the Museum of Natural History.
translation.es: - Claro. - Trabaja en el Museo de Historia Natural.

translation.en: Oh wow! Yeah, I compose music for video games all day,
translation.es: Sí, yo compongo música para videojuegos,

translation.en: so not a lot of human interaction for me either.
translation.es: así que tampoco tengo mucha interacción humana.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm Max, by the way.
Ordinarily, I'd shake your hand, but I'd almost certainly drop this,
translation.es: Normalmente les daría la mano, pero se me caerá esto,

translation.en: um, and I desperately need these dishes.
- Oh! Here. Let me open the door for you. - Brilliant. Cool.
Cool.
Okay, we've gotta go, but, um, welcome to the neighborhood, Max.
translation.es: Nos vamos, pero bienvenido al vecindario, Max.

translation.en: - Yeah, thanks. See ya. - Yeah. Yeah.
- Oh, don't give me that look. - What look? I wasn't giving a look.
translation.es: - No me mires así. - ¿Cómo? No te estaba mirando.

translation.en: - You wanna play matchmaker? - I didn't say that.
Since you mentioned it, I did notice a spark.
translation.es: Pero ya que lo dices, noté una chispa.

translation.en: - There was a spark? - Mm!
No, there was no spark.
I'm… I'm really focused on work right now, and I can't have any distractions.
translation.es: Estoy concentrada en el trabajo y no puedo tener distracciones.

translation.en: Not even in the form of our new neighbor and his cute accent?
translation.es: ¿Ni siquiera nuestro nuevo vecino con acento?

translation.en: I'm not like you.
- Okay. - No, no!
I just mean you can juggle a social life. That's not me.
translation.es: Digo que tienes una vida social. Yo no.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm a party planner. It's built into the job.
translation.es: Organizo fiestas. Es parte del trabajo.

translation.en: Well, I'm on a path here.
Nail this junior research position, get promoted to field researcher,
translation.es: Ser asistente, ascender a investigadora de campo

translation.en: and then work alongside my paleontologist hero.
translation.es: y trabajar con mi paleontóloga ídolo.

translation.en: Hey, I wanna introduce you to my friend Fun. I don't know if you two have ever met.
translation.es: Quiero presentarte a mi amiga Diversión. No sé si ya se conocían.

translation.en: Let me get through all of this stuff first, okay?
Downward Dad is out of control. He posts a different pose every day.
translation.es: Papá Yoga está descontrolado. Publica una pose cada día.

translation.en: - I liked his flying crow. - Okay, do not encourage him.
translation.es: - Me gustó la del cuervo. - No lo alientes.

translation.en: What? Wait. It's not just me. Do you see how many people like his yoga studio?
translation.es: No soy solo yo. ¿Ves a cuánta gente le gusta su estudio de yoga?

translation.en: Oh, I know. I've heard from everyone how amazing his classes are.
translation.es: Lo sé. Todo el mundo habla de lo increíbles que son sus clases.

translation.en: We should take one.
No, I'm good.
I got enough secondhand yoga from him growing up that I am centered for life.
translation.es: Aprendí suficiente yoga indirectamente para toda la vida.

translation.en: I think it's sweet that he's on social media. It's like he's trying to connect with you.
translation.es: Es dulce que use las redes. Es como si intentara conectarse contigo.

translation.en: Yeah, I love him, but he's my dad, not my buddy.
translation.es: Sí, lo adoro, pero es mi papá, no mi amigo.

translation.en: I'm fine with our lives being separate.
Okay. Well, if you just left one comment, it would probably make his day.
translation.es: Bueno, pero si le comentaras algo, le alegrarías el día.

translation.en: Fine. I'll throw him a like, but no comment.
translation.es: Está bien. Le daré un me gusta, pero no comentaré.

translation.en: - You happy? - Mm- hmm.
So this is, like, our 19th Cassie- palooza kickoff.
translation.es: Este ya es el Cassie-palooza número 19.

translation.en: It's gonna be the best ever!
Hey, Bob.
Good evening, Cassie.
- Thank you. - Ladies, welcome.
She's my favorite person. I love her so much.
translation.es: Es mi persona favorita. La adoro.

translation.en: Cassie's here!
- Wow. This is actually really pretty. - Hi!
- Happy birthday, Cassie! - Whoo!
Happy birthday! It's so good to see you.
translation.es: ¡Feliz cumpleaños! - Qué bueno verte. - No es mi cumpleaños, Jeremy.

translation.en: It's not my birthday, Jeremy. Not my birthday.
translation.es: - Qué bueno verte. - No es mi cumpleaños, Jeremy.

translation.en: You are the best!
Yes!
Cassie! Drink, drink, drink!
- - It's our song. - It's Koop! - Yeah.
- We have to dance! - Okay.
Come on! Come on!
Go, girl! Go, girl! Go, go! Break it down. Break it down.
Go, Lisa! Go, Lisa!
Yeah!
Yes, Cassie!
I'm flying!
Careful! You're gonna get hurt.
- Drink! Drink! - Here! It's your birthday!
Should I do it? Should I do it? Okay.
- More! More! More! More! - Oh yeah!
- So much fun! You! - You kept drinking shots.
Because you kept handing them to me!
You're crazy! You're-- I can't keep up with you.
translation.es: ¡Estás loca! No puedo seguir tu ritmo.

translation.en: Okay, you guys, next stop is Roddy's house.
I rented a waterslide that goes from the roof into his pool!
translation.es: Alquilé un tobogán de agua que va del techo a su piscina.

translation.en: - - Let's go!
What's wrong?
You're bailing, aren't you?
I bet you no one would notice if we snuck back home right now.
translation.es: Nadie se daría cuenta si regresamos a casa ahora.

translation.en: I would notice!
You know that these people are terrible, right?
translation.es: Sabes que esta gente es lo peor, ¿no?

translation.en: They're just trying to have a good time, which is exactly what you should be doing!
translation.es: Solo quieren divertirse, y tú deberías hacer lo mismo. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: - Come on. - I like having a good time too.
Only I wanna do it with people who'd actually care if something happened to me,
translation.es: Pero con gente a la que le importaría si algo me pasa,

translation.en: or who would like me even if I didn't rent a very dangerous waterslide.
translation.es: o a quien le caiga bien aunque no haya alquilado un tobogán muy peligroso.

translation.en: Don't tell me you're jealous.
translation.es: No me digas que estás celosa.

translation.en: I am not jealous of people who look filtered 24/7.
translation.es: No estoy celosa de la gente que vive con un filtro.

translation.en: I don't know! Kinda sounds like you're jealous to me!
- Come on, Cassie, let's go! - Okay, one second!
You know, you're different when you're with them.
translation.es: Eres diferente cuando estás con ellos.

translation.en: I'm what?
It's like you think you aren't worth anything if you aren't seen.
translation.es: Es como si creyeras que no vales nada si no te ven.

translation.en: Well, at least I'm out making friends, and I'm not hiding at my desk.
translation.es: Al menos estoy haciendo amigos y no escondida en mi escritorio.

translation.en: Because I think that there is more to life than partying
translation.es: Porque la vida es más que salir de fiesta

translation.en: or knowing all the names of bartenders in town.
translation.es: o saber los nombres de los bármanes.

translation.en: Here we go! My life isn't as important because it's social.
translation.es: Aquí vamos. Mi vida no importa porque es social.

translation.en: Just because I'm not one of your science friends doesn't mean I don't work hard.
translation.es: No ser científica no significa que no trabaje duro.

translation.en: - I didn't say that! - But you meant it!
I see how you only pretend to be interested when I tell you about some event I planned
translation.es: Sé que finges interés cuando te cuento sobre mis eventos,

translation.en: or your offhanded comments about how I'm never home.
translation.es: y te quejas de que nunca estoy en casa.

translation.en: Like you don't pretend to understand my life?
translation.es: Tú también finges entender mi vida.

translation.en: Tell me what I do.
You work at the museum.
But what do I do there?
I don't know. I don't understand that stuff.
translation.es: No sé, no entiendo esas cosas.

translation.en: And I don't understand your stuff.
translation.es: Y yo no entiendo tus cosas.

translation.en: Classic.
We never hang out anymore.
Just the two of us.
We're busy. We'll just have to get better at making time for each other.
translation.es: Estamos ocupadas. Tendremos que hacer tiempo para eso.

translation.en: I don't know, Cassie. I don't think being friends should feel like work.
translation.es: No sé. No creo que ser amigas deba sentirse como un trabajo.

translation.en: I don't think it does, Lisa.
But I can tell from your face that you do.
translation.es: Pero veo por tu cara que tú sí.

translation.en: It's fine.
I don't wanna stay best friends out of habit anyway.
translation.es: No quiero ser tu mejor amiga solo por costumbre.

translation.en: I'm a habit?
Th-- That's it? You're just gonna say something like that and walk away?
translation.es: ¿Eso es todo? ¿Vas a decir algo así e irte?

translation.en: Maybe it's time we both admit that we've outgrown each other.
translation.es: Es hora de admitir que crecimos y no es como antes.

translation.en: - Who's ready to go to Roddy's? -
translation.es: ¿Quién está listo para ir a lo de Roddy?

translation.en: Let's do it. Sorry about that, guys.
Mona's missing her smile.
translation.es: A Mona le falta su sonrisa.

translation.en: Here's one.
Put this here.
That'll fix it.
Oh no.
No, no, no, no.
No. No, no, no.
So stupid.
So stupid.
Uh, hi.
Excuse me?
Did that go viral?
Oh, you're awake!
Welcome. Welcome.
No, no, don't worry. No, it's research. It's not gone viral.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Es investigación. No se hizo viral.

translation.en: I'm Val. I'll be your handler through this transition.
translation.es: Soy Val. Seré responsable de ti en esta transición.

translation.en: Well, it's nice to finally meet you, Miss Cassandra Adeline Garcia.
translation.es: Qué bueno conocerte, señorita Cassandra Adeline García.

translation.en: Now, according to my notes, you go by Cassie. You're 25--
translation.es: Ahora, según mis notas, te dicen Cassie, tienes 25 años…

translation.en: - In a few days. - Huh?
Parents, Howie and Sofia, divorced.
Born May 31st, died May 25th.
translation.es: Naciste el 31 de mayo, moriste el 25 de mayo.

translation.en: Died?
Oh, I'm sorry. Died May 26th.
translation.es: Lo siento. Moriste el 26 de mayo.

translation.en: Who… who are you?
I'm Val. Otherwise known as your temporary guardian angel.
translation.es: Soy Val. También conocida como tu ángel de la guarda provisional.

translation.en: You don't look like a guardian angel. Shouldn't you have a halo?
translation.es: No pareces un ángel. ¿No tienes una aureola?

translation.en: - Oh, special occasions only. - Okay, what about wings?
Oh, no, we phased those out years ago.
Okay. This… this can't really be happening.
translation.es: Bien, esto no puede estar pasando.

translation.en: I was… I was just with my friends.
Oh! I know! I… I had… I had champagne with gold flakes in it,
translation.es: ¡Ya sé! Tomé champaña con láminas de oro.

translation.en: and sometimes it makes you hallucinate.  I'm hallucinating.
translation.es: A veces te hacen alucinar. Estoy alucinando.

translation.en: No. This isn't a hallucination.
translation.es: No, esto no es una alucinación.

translation.en: Oh, this… this part's always hard.
How can I put this?
Yeah, um, you died.
- Stop saying that! - I mean, you saw it yourself, so--
- I died in the bathroom? - Yeah.
Oh! Oh, this keeps getting worse!
translation.es: Esto se pone cada vez peor.

translation.en: Look, it's going to be okay.
And the good news is that the worst is over now that you're d--
translation.es: La buena noticia es que lo peor ya pasó, ya estás mu…

translation.en: No longer living.
You don't have to deal with all of those human annoyances,
translation.es: Ya no lidiarás con todas las molestias humanas,

translation.en: you know, like heartbreak or PMS.
translation.es: como el desamor o el síndrome premenstrual.

translation.en: Just think of the afterlife as one long spa day.
translation.es: Piensa en el más allá como un largo día de spa.

translation.en: And if you're one of the lucky ones, it could last for an eternity.
translation.es: Si eres afortunada, podría durar una eternidad.

translation.en: So, I went up?
- Well-- - Is this down? I went down?
You're in the middle. We call this the In- Between.
translation.es: Estás en el medio. Lo llamamos el Intermedio.

translation.en: So like general admission?
Sure. This is your personal waiting room.
translation.es: Claro. Esta es tu sala de espera personal.

translation.en: It's your safe space.
It's designed specifically to your taste
translation.es: Está diseñado específicamente a tu gusto

translation.en: to make your transition more…  …comfortable.
translation.es: para que tu transición sea más cómoda.

translation.en: So everyone who dies is in the In- Between?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿todos los que mueren están en el Intermedio?

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. Maybe I should give you a pamphlet.
No, no! I don't need a pamphlet. Just tell me.
translation.es: No necesito un folleto. Solo dime.

translation.en: It can't be crazier than anything that's happening.
translation.es: Ya no puede ponerse más loco.

translation.en: Well, the In- Between is for those who have unfinished business
translation.es: Bueno, el Intermedio es para aquellos que tienen asuntos pendientes en la Tierra,

translation.en: back on Earth,
translation.es: es para aquellos que tienen asuntos pendientes en la Tierra,

translation.en: like yourself.
What unfinished business?
Well, you get a second chance to make things right
translation.es: Tendrás una segunda oportunidad de enmendar las cosas con ciertas personas.

translation.en: with a select list of people,
translation.es: de enmendar las cosas con ciertas personas.

translation.en: you know, and if you succeed, you get sent to the Above.
translation.es: Si tienes éxito, serás enviada Arriba.

translation.en: And if you don't, well, you know, it's…
translation.es: Y si no, bueno, ya sabes…

translation.en: it's just, it's… Yeah, it's, you know…
- It's… Yeah. - It…
Yeah.
But I thought it was for murderers and people who don't like Beyoncé.
translation.es: Pensé que era para asesinos y gente a la que no le gusta Beyoncé.

translation.en: - I'm a proud member of the Beyhive. - Yeah.
No, no, it's a tiered system. Yeah.
translation.es: No, es un sistema escalonado. Sí.

translation.en: You want the Above. Trust me.
translation.es: Quieres ir Arriba. Confía en mí.

translation.en: You ready to meet your list?
Now? No. I'm not ready! Oh!
That was like riding a roller coaster backwards and blindfolded.
translation.es: Fue como subir a una montaña rusa con los ojos vendados.

translation.en: You get used to it.
Wait, we're at my dad's house.
translation.es: Estamos en la casa de mi papá.

translation.en: Hey, Dad!
Hey.
Hey!
Why isn't he responding?
He can't see or hear you.
No one can.
What? No, that can't be right.
Well, we can't risk scaring people on Earth.
translation.es: No podemos arriesgarnos a asustar a la gente.

translation.en: They're so fragile.
Hello? Dad?
It's me! It's Cassie, your favorite and only child.
translation.es: Soy yo, Cassie. Tu hija única y favorita.

translation.en: He never let me eat junk food.
translation.es: Nunca me dejó comer comida chatarra.

translation.en: What is goin' on?
And why is this house such a mess?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué es un desastre la casa? Así…

translation.en: This… this is not like him.
translation.es: ¿Y por qué es un desastre la casa? Así… Así no es él.

translation.en: He's Downward Dad. He's all about healthy living,
translation.es: Él es Papá Yoga. Le gusta la vida sana, hace su propio kombucha.

translation.en: and he even makes his own kombucha.
translation.es: Le gusta la vida sana, hace su propio kombucha.

translation.en: How long have I been gone?
Val, how long?
- A year. - A year?
It feels like a day.
Well, time works differently up there.
Maybe I should've taken a pamphlet.
translation.es: Tal vez sí necesitaba un folleto.

translation.en: The last time he was like this was when my mom left.
translation.es: Solo estuvo así cuando mamá se fue.

translation.en: After you passed,
he gave up.
When was the last time you saw him?
I… I don't know. I…
I kept meaning to visit, but there were all these events.
translation.es: quería venir a visitar, pero había muchos eventos.

translation.en: I liked one of his posts. Does that count?
translation.es: Me gustó una de sus fotos. ¿Eso cuenta?

translation.en: Yeah.
Is that why he's on my list?
He's in mourning.
He needs a reason to feel hopeful again.
translation.es: Necesita una razón para sentirse esperanzado de nuevo.

translation.en: Tell me what I should do.
You should see the rest of your list.
translation.es: Deberías ver el resto de tu lista.

translation.en: Lisa? Really, Val? No. Pass. Hard pass.
translation.es: ¿Lisa? ¿En serio? Val, no. Paso. Paso de una.

translation.en: There is no hard pass.
There isn't even a regular pass.
What about if I kill it with my dad? Not kill kill. You know what I mean.
translation.es: ¿Y si la rompo con papá? Es decir, no romperla, ya sabes.

translation.en: Can we pretend Lisa isn't on the list?
Why are you so afraid of seeing your best friend again?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te asusta ver a tu mejor amiga?

translation.en: - My former BFF, and I'm not. - Mm.
translation.es: Mi ex mejor amiga, y no me asusta.

translation.en: There's too much history between us.
Besides, I don't know if I want to. Some friendships just end, you know?
translation.es: Además, no sé si quiero. Algunas amistades terminan.

translation.en: Shouldn't I have a say in who's on my list? This is my afterlife we're talking about.
translation.es: ¿No decido sobre mi lista? Es mi vida después de la muerte.

translation.en: She's been hiding in her work ever since you left.
translation.es: Se esconde en su trabajo desde que te fuiste.

translation.en: Last one out. It's the same every day.
translation.es: La última en irse. Es lo mismo todos los días.

translation.en: How about we skip Lisa and move to the next name?
translation.es: ¿Nos saltamos a Lisa y pasamos al siguiente nombre?

translation.en: - I'll take it. No complaints. Pinky swear. - No. I don't do that.
translation.es: - Lo aceptaré. Sin quejas. Lo juro. - No, no hago eso.

translation.en: But I will show you who's next on your list.
Please be Koop. Please be Koop. Please be Koop.
How are you doing that?
Oh, you can do it too. It's all part of your basic angel package.
translation.es: Tú también puedes. Es parte del paquete básico de ángeles.

translation.en: You just focus on where you want to go, give a little snap or a nod.
translation.es: Te concentras en dónde quieres ir y das un chasquido o asientes.

translation.en: One angel I know likes to wink.
translation.es: A un ángel le gusta guiñar un ojo.

translation.en: Just make it your own. And then you're there.
translation.es: Ponle tu sello. Y luego estás ahí.

translation.en: So, I can go anywhere?
Oh, no, not anywhere.
Your teleporting is limited to places that you're needed only.
translation.es: La teletransportación se limita a lugares donde te necesitan.

translation.en: No detours.
- Got it. - Right. Now, back to the list.
translation.es: - Entendido. - Bien. Ahora, volvamos a la lista.

translation.en: - Ugh. I don't know if I'm ready for more. - Morgan, slow down!
translation.es: No sé si estoy lista para más. Morgan, ¡más despacio!

translation.en: - Wait for Mommy! -
Hi, you're so fast.  Oh.
- That's-- - Your mother.
I haven't called her that since the day she moved out.
translation.es: No le digo así desde que se mudó.

translation.en: - She's Sofia to me. -
Is that my half sister?
I've never met her.
So, you do have some unfinished business, then.
Can we go now, please?

Not easy ones.

- I believe in you. - That makes one of us.
You have the five Earth days leading up to your birthday to complete this list.

translation.en: It's… it's like Cassie…
No. No, you're right. Yeah.
Okay, right.
Right, so a name will disappear
each time it's deemed that you have closure.

translation.en: Well, you'll find a way.
Can I text? Tweet? TikTok?
No, no, and definitely negatory.
Do I at least get cool superpowers, like mind control or something?

translation.en: It's guardian- angel level only.

Except between noon and 4:00.
I'm kidding. It's a joke.

Well,
actually, I, um…
I was wondering--
Yeah, yeah. I know what you're thinking.

you do get a wardrobe change.

translation.en: so make it count.
- It's so sparkly. -
I think this might be my favorite part about being here.

translation.en: I guess it really is time.
Somebody call Marie Kondo because joy is not sparking here.

Great.
Guess I'm ripping the Band- Aid off.

What would Val do?
- I did it. -
What the gamer geek?
Who are you, and what did you do to my room?

translation.en: Hey.
Oh, the cute neighbor still lives here. Are you two in love yet?

translation.en: - Hey, you. - Hey. Morning.
- Are you just getting home now? - Yeah.
I'm, uh, in the process of scoring this game
about, uh, post- apocalyptic, motorcycle- riding zombie Vikings.
It sounds lame now I'm saying it out loud, but it's pretty dope
translation.es: Sí, suena patético decirlo en voz alta, pero es genial.

translation.en: if post- apocalyptic, motorcycle- riding zombie Vikings are your thing.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I, um…
I like getting to work before everybody else, you know?

translation.en: The calm is… is, um--
Calming.
- Exactly. - Yeah.
- You get it. - Yeah, I do.
- - Yeah.
Cool, well, hopefully one day, when our schedules can align,

- Yeah. - Yeah?
- Yeah, okay. Okay. Yes, yes. - Yeah.
- Yeah, I would… I would like that. - Brilliant.
- Okay, well, um, I'm gonna go. - Yeah.
- Cool. Well, have a good day. - Thank you. You too.
translation.es: - Que tengas buen día. - Gracias, igualmente.

translation.en: - Good seeing you. Bye. - Bye.
It's been a year, and you still haven't gone out with him?

So the way we ended things… Talk about bad timing!

I know I should still be mad at you, but it doesn't feel right anymore.

Ugh! I hate being so out of touch!
Morning, Emme. How are you?
Hi. I've got your order waiting.
Oh my-- Emme, you spoil me.

translation.en: - Okay. - Ta- da!
Oh. Ooh. What is that smell?
I'm working on a new brownie recipe. They're just out of the oven. Wanna try?

translation.en: I will always be your guinea pig.

translation.en: So, um, how has everything been? Are you feeling a little bit more settled?

translation.en: Things are good.
Haven't seen much of the town yet. I should probably get out more.

translation.en: Baked goods aren't the best conversationalists.

translation.en: Well, neither are bones.
I am thinking of throwing a one- year anniversary party for the shop.

translation.en: That would be so cool. Careful. It's hot.
translation.es: - Eso sería genial. - Con cuidado. Está caliente.

translation.en: - Oh! - Okay.
I miss brownies. Why couldn't I have had death by chocolate?

translation.en: Wow. Wow. I mean, this is… this is incredible.
Oh, it's made with love. And agave.

translation.en: I need to go to work, but thank you. I'll see you later, okay?

translation.en: - Ciao for now. - Bye!
Bye.
So, how's your list coming along?
The quiet type, huh?
So…
this is your life now.
Okay.
- You beat me to work. Again. -
Oh, jumpy.
Are you on something?
Next time, bring enough for the whole class!

translation.en: Yeah.
- What do you want, Raj? - Did you hear?
Uh, hear what?
Dr. Redding's leading a dig at Hell's Creek this summer,

translation.es: y está buscando un investigador de campo.

Not only that, the GOAT herself is coming into the office

translation.en: to hold interviews. I'm about to go sign up over at the…

translation.en: break room.
A sign- up sheet.
How retro. But I dig it.
What are you waiting for? Just write your name.
L- I--
- Pretty competitive, huh? -
And she's only picking one person.

translation.en: I think we all know who that'll be.

translation.en: R- A- J.
B- R- I- T- T- O.
Only four spots left.
Don't listen. He's trying to psych you out in the lamest way possible.

translation.en: I'm gonna sign up later.
I have a lot of work to do, so I can't really think about this kind of thing right now.

translation.en: Sure.
You're giving up?
In the bag, Britto.
What's so important?
I left a farmer in his barn- themed waiting room for you. Are you okay?

translation.en: It… it's Lisa. She's so stubborn.
translation.es: Es Lisa. Es muy terca. No creo que esto vaya a funcionar.

translation.en: You know, I don't think this is gonna work.
translation.es: Es muy terca. No creo que esto vaya a funcionar.

translation.en: She doesn't seem to miss me. There's no trace of me anywhere.

translation.en: Oh, and get this. I've been replaced by this roommate who is full- on dark web.

translation.en: - Why aren't you saying anything? - You're saying enough for the both of us.

translation.en: Look, I know going back is hard,
translation.es: Mira, sé que regresar es difícil,

Oh, I don't know about that.
Well, maybe if we cut out all the Is and mes and look harder,

Why are you sleeping?
There is a whole world out there, and you are missing it.

I need to talk to you.
Lisa, wake up!
Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!
Wake up! Wake up!
Come on, Val. This isn't fair.

Piper, turn down your game.

translation.en: Trying to sleep.
- Why won't you let me sleep? -
- What's happening? - I don't know.
Oh, but it worked!
You can't be… you can't be here. No.
Oh, you can see me?
This is a dream. Maybe a nightmare. Work… work… work has been stressful.

translation.en: You can hear me too?
This isn't supposed to be happening.
This is awesome, and crazy, but mostly awesome.

Yeah, that sucked.
I don't believe in whatever you are.

translation.es: ¡No temas! Soy un ángel guardián. Bueno, no oficialmente. Así lo pienso yo. En fin, los títulos no importan ahora.

translation.en: but that's how I make sense of it. Titles aren't important right now.
translation.es: Así lo pienso yo. En fin, los títulos no importan ahora.

Not… not in an ominous way! In a good way.

translation.en: Everyone's staring at me like I'm a unicorn.

Unicorns are in a different area.

Okay.
Mm. Here.
Yep, yep, yep. There we are.
Okay. It's quite rare.
Said In- Betweener can only affect the physical world

translation.en: once visible to subject.

translation.en: So,
it might be a fluke in the system,

Go on, then. Start talking to someone. Let's see what happens.

Go on.
Hey, guys. How's it goin'?
Hello?

Isn't it beautiful?
You know the saying angel on your shoulder? That's who I want to be.

translation.en: A guardian angel who's there through all of these stages of life.

translation.en: Not just at the end.

Oh, he can see you!
Yeah. Animals are more open to the spiritual world. Some kids are too.

So we can talk to animals?

translation.en: - Oh. - Sorry.

Not much to report since I talked to you last.

translation.en: He's been doing this since you left. Brings him comfort.

translation.es: Estoy más concentrado en dirigirlo que en dar clases.

Try. Maybe I will.
That was a long time ago.
I'm sorry for not visiting much.
For making fun of your Downward Dad posts.

Somehow.
We can try your mum.
I'm not ready for her yet.
I'm going back to Lisa. I wanna fix this.
translation.es: Volveré con Lisa. Quiero arreglar esto.

translation.en: It'll be day two, so make it count.

Wait, Lisa, wait!
- You felt that too? - This isn't happening.
Let me explain, okay? Or at least try.

translation.en: Go away.
A door? Really?
Oh, come on!
Let's analyze some fossils. Whoo!
I'm not gonna hurt you. I just wanna talk.

translation.en: Okay. If you don't wanna talk right now, then we don't have to. Fine.

translation.es: Está bien. Pero no iré a ninguna parte hasta hacerlo.

translation.en: No, no. I'm just working too hard.
Because I'm working hard, it could cause the visions.
Okay. I'm sick! So sick. I'm sick.
translation.es: Bien. Estoy enferma. Estoy muy enferma.

translation.en: - Otherwise, it doesn't make sense. - Maybe not, but it's happening.
translation.es: - Si no, no tiene sentido. - Quizá no, pero es real.

translation.en: Don't be shy. Come and try.
Why wait till it's too late?

translation.en: Uh- oh. You look like you could do with a caramel mocha pretzel bite.

translation.en: Okay.
Or two.
Let's get you inside.

I need an exorcist.
Well, I can't help you with that.
Okay. So, um, this is the one- year anniversary of my best friend's death.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Es el primer aniversario de la muerte de mi mejor amiga.

translation.en: - I think it's making me a little crazy. - Your flatmate, the one you told me about?
translation.es: - Creo que enloquecí. - ¿Tu amiga de la que me hablaste?

translation.en: - You told her about me? - Yeah, Cassie.
This is gonna sound really weird, but, um,
she talks to me, and…
…I can see her.
That doesn't sound weird at all. She was your best mate. She's part of you.
translation.es: No suena extraño. Era tu mejor amiga. Es parte de ti.

translation.en: - Thank you for letting me lay this on you. -
I just… I really, really needed to talk to someone.
Is she here now?
- Boo! - Uh- huh.
- Yeah. Yeah. She, uh… - Oh.
…she thinks your store needs a makeover.
Oh! Well, I'm open to anything that will encourage people to hang out.
translation.es: Acepto todo lo que atraiga gente.

translation.en: See? She agrees with me. I'm starting to like this Emme.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Está de acuerdo. Me agrada esta Emme.

translation.en: Look, everyone deals with grief in their own way.

translation.en: - It's a compliment when they come back. - This doesn't feel like a compliment.
translation.es: Cada uno lidia con el dolor a su modo. Es un honor que regresen. Esto no se siente como un honor.

translation.en: - Would your friend like an eclair? - Don't… don't encourage her, please.
translation.es: - ¿Tu amiga quiere un éclair? - No la alientes.

translation.en: Thank you for understanding, Emme. Thank you. I just…
I think that I need to go and be by myself for a while. I'm just gonna do that.
translation.es: Creo que necesito estar sola un rato. Iré a hacer eso.

translation.es: ¿Y el éclair? Yo no como e igual lo aceptaría.

translation.en: Could you please just give me a little bit of space?
Okay.
- - How was your walk?
Okay, that's it. I'm Googling therapists.

translation.en: I didn't mean to scare you. Okay?  I am also trying to make sense of everything.
translation.es: No quise asustarte. Yo también estoy intentando entenderlo.

translation.en: Look, is this happening because of that fight we had?
translation.es: ¿Esto es por la pelea que tuvimos?

translation.en: If I had known that was the last time we would see each other, I--
translation.es: Si hubiera sabido que era la última vez que te vería…

translation.en: I would have done things differently too.
Is that why you're here? Be… because of what I said?
translation.es: ¿Por eso estás aquí? ¿Por lo que dije?

translation.en: According to…
- Do you mean God? - Val.
A woman? I knew it.
translation.es: - ¿Es mujer? Lo sabía. - Es mi guía.

translation.en: Val's my handler. She's like my temp guardian angel.
translation.es: - ¿Es mujer? Lo sabía. - Es mi guía. Es como mi ángel guardián temporal.

translation.en: In order for me to move up, fingers crossed,
translation.es: Para poder subir, crucemos los dedos,

translation.en: I'm supposed to help you, my dad, and my mom for some reason.
translation.es: debo ayudarte a ti, a mi papá y a mi mamá, por alguna razón.

translation.en: Well, I don't need help.
Look, I didn't make the list.
I wanna show you something.
I found it under your bed.
Your dad took the rest of your stuff.
translation.es: Tu papá se llevó el resto de tus cosas.

translation.en: Um…  You wouldn't recognize your room. - Oh, I saw. - Huh.
translation.es: - No reconocerías tu habitación. - La vi.

translation.en: Something told me I should keep it.
translation.es: Algo me dijo que debía guardarla.

translation.en: - I thought you'd forgotten about me. - What?
We've been in each other's lives for as long as I can remember.
translation.es: Estás en mi vida desde que tengo memoria.

translation.en: How… how could you think that?
Being dead brings up a lot of insecurities.
Are those from your mom?
Yep.
Postcards from all the amazing places she visited after she left us.
translation.es: Postales de todos los lugares geniales que visitó cuando nos dejó.

translation.en: Hey, uh,
would you…
…maybe wanna puzzle?
You still have it.
Some of the pieces might be missing.
I found it on the floor that morning.

translation.es: No dejemos a Mona sin su sonrisa esta vez.

translation.en: Look, I don't know what's happening, and I probably need to schedule an MRI,
translation.es: No sé qué está pasando y tendré que hacerme una resonancia,

translation.en: but it is really, really nice to have you back.
translation.es: pero es hermoso tenerte de vuelta.

translation.en: It's really nice to be back.
Hi, Piper.
Are you okay?
No.
- What do you think she does in there? - Money laundering, hacking.
translation.es: ¿Qué hará ahí? Lavar dinero, hackear. Típica compañera de casa.

translation.en: Basic roommate stuff.
translation.es: Lavar dinero, hackear. Típica compañera de casa.

translation.en: - This almost feels like old times. - Almost.

translation.es: Incluso si aún no sé cuál es.

translation.en: - This is all my fault. - No!
If I'd just stayed there with you that night, then none of this would've even happened.
translation.es: Si me hubiera quedado contigo esa noche, nada de esto habría pasado.

translation.en: No. This was gonna happen no matter what you did. It was my time.
translation.es: Hubiera pasado igual. Era mi hora.

translation.en: When… when you were a kid, and your parents would fight,
translation.es: Cuando eras niña y tus padres se peleaban,

translation.en: I was the one who would distract you with a puzzle.
translation.es: yo te distraía con un rompecabezas.

translation.en: Yeah, and you had extra PJs for me whenever I didn't wanna go home.
translation.es: Y tenías pijamas de más para mí siempre que no quería ir a casa.

translation.en: - You've always been there for me. - But that night, I wasn't.
translation.es: - Siempre estuviste para mí. - Pero no esa noche.

translation.en: I mean, I heard you coming to my door, and I…
translation.es: Escuché que me tocaste la puerta…

translation.en: I have been mad at myself ever since.
- Hey. -
Don't be.
In a weird way, what happened is a good thing. Now… now you get to live your own life
translation.es: En cierto modo, fue algo bueno. Ahora puedes vivir tu propia vida.

translation.en: and don't have to worry about taking care of me anymore.
You don't mean that. I can't lie. I'm almost an angel.
translation.es: - No hablarás en serio. - No puedo mentir. Soy casi un ángel.

translation.en: Well,
I'd like to be there for you one last time.
translation.es: quiero estar para ti una vez más.

translation.en: I don't know why I'm supposed to care about her.
translation.es: No sé por qué debería importarme ella.

translation.en: She left me, you know?
But she's on my list, so…
translation.es: Pero está en mi lista, así que…

translation.en: Well, hey, if you don't care, then why keep her postcards?
translation.es: Oye, si no te importa, ¿por qué guardaste sus postales?

translation.en: How can I help you with your mom?
I can't believe she lives here. This is exactly what she ran away from.
translation.es: No puedo creer que viva aquí. Esto es exactamente de lo que huyó.

translation.en: - Hi. - Hi. I was so glad you called.
translation.es: - Hola. - Hola. Me alegra que hayas llamado.

translation.en: Come in. Thanks.
I, um, thought we could catch up on the patio.
translation.es: Pensé que podíamos charlar en el patio.

translation.en: I made lemonade. Would you like some? I have tea.
translation.es: Hice limonada. ¿Quieres un poco? Tengo té.

translation.en: I have one of those Jarritos. You used to love those.
Um, I think water is fine. Thanks.
- How are you, Lisa? - Good.
- Still working at the museum? - Yeah.
Yeah, it's been busy, but it's been really good.
translation.es: Sí, es demandante, pero va todo bien.

translation.en: - Good. - How are you?
Busy. Busy with Morgan.
- This is Morgan. - Oh, let me see.
- Oh, she's so cute! - She's like Cassie in a lot of ways.
translation.es: - ¡Es adorable! - Se parece mucho a Cassie.

translation.en: Yeah, look, she's got that same mischievous grin.
translation.es: Sí, mira, tiene la misma sonrisa traviesa.

translation.en: They would've liked each other. I always wanted to introduce them,
but I wanted Cassie and I to be okay first.
translation.es: pero antes quería arreglar las cosas con Cassie.

translation.en: I'd like to get started.
So,
I found these in Cassie's box of keepsakes.
translation.es: encontré esto en la caja de recuerdos de Cassie.

translation.en: She kept them?
It was my only way to know you. Tell her that, please.
translation.es: Era mi única forma de conocerte. Díselo.

translation.en: Yeah. I think they made her feel closer to you.
translation.es: Sí, la hacían sentir más cerca de ti.

translation.en: I used to read her Mary Poppins.
She always wanted to see London. Did she ever go?
No, I didn't go anywhere. I was hoping you would come back to me.
translation.es: No fui a ningún lado. Esperaba que volvieras.

translation.en: No, she didn't.
Too bad. She would have loved it.
Mmm. Her first crush, actually, was this guy who moved here from England.
translation.es: Su primer amor fue un tipo que se mudó aquí de Inglaterra.

translation.en: - Ian. - Ian.
It's one of the many things we have… had in common.
translation.es: Es una de las cosas que tenemos… teníamos en común.

translation.en: I missed so much of her life.
translation.es: Me perdí tanto de su vida.

translation.en: It must have been confusing for her, dealing with boys and dating.
translation.es: Debe haber sido confuso para ella lidiar con chicos y citas.

translation.en: Yeah, but my mom was there for both of us to answer some of the tough questions, so…
translation.es: Sí, pero estaba mi mamá para responder algunas preguntas difíciles.

translation.en: Ask her why she left.
I'm sure that this is, like, really hard to talk about, but, um…
translation.es: Estoy segura de que es difícil hablar de esto, pero Cassie…

translation.en: Cassie always wanted to know why you left.
translation.es: quería saber por qué te fuiste.

translation.en: There's not one reason.
What did I do to make you leave?
Was it something Cassie did?
No, never.
Cassie, she was an angel.
It was all me.
I…
I was young.
And I thought I knew more than anyone around me.
translation.es: Creía que sabía más que los demás.

translation.en: Sounds like Cassie.
I, uh, had this romantic idea of what I thought being a wife and mother was like.
translation.es: Tenía una idea romántica de lo que sería ser esposa y madre.

translation.en: But in reality,
I wasn't ready to be responsible for anyone.
translation.es: no estaba lista para encargarme de nadie.

translation.en: Looking back at it, I see how patient and loving Howie was,
translation.es: Mirando hacia atrás, veo cuán paciente y amoroso era Howie,

translation.en: but at the time,
I found that suffocating.
I said the same thing.
For a while, Howie used to send me
translation.es: Durante un tiempo, Howie me mandaba

translation.en: pictures and letters, telling me about her.
translation.es: fotos y cartas donde me contaba sobre ella.

translation.en: I never knew that.
But I was too ashamed to respond, so he stopped.
translation.es: Me avergonzaba responder, y dejó de hacerlo.

translation.en: I convinced myself that postcards were an adequate placeholder,
translation.es: Me convencí de que las postales eran un reemplazo adecuado,

translation.en: and one day I'd be able to explain it all, and we'd actually laugh about it.
translation.es: y de que un día podría explicárselo todo y nos reiríamos.

translation.en: Sounds so ridiculous when I say it out loud.
translation.es: Suena ridículo cuando lo digo en voz alta.

translation.en: I… I let her down.
The last time I saw her was college graduation,
translation.es: La última vez que la vi fue en su graduación,

translation.en: and we were like strangers.
I remember.
Now it's too late to make it right.
And I'll never forgive myself for that.
Okay, I've heard enough.  I need to go.
If Cassie was here right now,
what would you say to her?
What are you doing? I didn't ask that.
That I regret not taking her to London.
translation.es: Que lamento no haberla llevado a Londres.

translation.en: I should have been there
to help her with her homework,
hold her when she had a nightmare.
I made a lot of selfish decisions.
But one thing that never changed--
translation.es: Pero una cosa que nunca cambió…

translation.en: One thing that never changed was my love for her.
translation.es: Lo que nunca cambió fue mi amor por ella.

translation.en: If Cassie were here…
I would tell her that the day she was born
translation.es: le diría que el día que nació

translation.en: was one of the brightest moments of my life.
translation.es: fue uno de los momentos más hermosos de mi vida.

translation.en: And running away,
it was my worst.
I just hope she knows how sorry I am.
translation.es: Espero que sepa cuánto lo siento.

translation.en: She does.
She knows.
Are you okay?
Hey.
Hey.
How are we supposed to we finish this if we don't have all the pieces?
God, this is so frustrating. Why did you even choose this puzzle?
translation.es: Es muy frustrante. ¿Por qué elegiste este rompecabezas?

translation.en: Uh, you sure you wanna talk about the puzzle?
Do you know how hard it was not being able to say everything I wanted to her?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo duro que fue no poder decirle lo que quería?

translation.en: I really don't.
I have years of questions.
Yet standing next to her, I found that I just wanted to yell or run away.
translation.es: Pero al lado de ella, solo sentí ganas de gritar o huir.

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter.
Yeah, but you didn't, and that's a really good thing.
translation.es: Pero no lo hiciste, y eso es algo muy bueno.

translation.en: Would you have translated if I did?
It upset me that you took the conversation over.
translation.es: Me molestó que tomaras el control.

translation.en: No, no. I didn't take anything over.
I could tell that she needed to talk to you, and you needed to hear what she had to say.
translation.es: Vi que necesitaba hablar contigo, y tú necesitabas escucharla.

translation.en: That was for me to decide!
- I'm on your side, Cassie. - Ugh.
I could tell she needed to talk. You needed to hear what she had to say!
translation.es: Vi que necesitaba hablar. ¡Tenías que escuchar lo que decía!

translation.en: You don't get it!
How could you?
translation.es: ¿Cómo podrías? Tienes una vida y un futuro perfectos.

translation.en: You have a perfect life, a perfect future. I have none of those.
translation.es: ¿Cómo podrías? Tienes una vida y un futuro perfectos. ¡Y yo, nada!

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're mad at your mom. That's totally understandable, but…
translation.es: Está bien. Estás enojada con tu mamá. Es entendible, pero…

translation.en: You know what? It's…
It's not okay for you to take it out on me.
Sorry. Does my messy non- life make you uncomfortable?
Here we go again. Classic.
I died before I ever got a chance to live!
Well, I'm hurt too! Did you think about that, huh?
translation.es: ¡A mí también me duele! ¿Pensaste en eso?

translation.en: God, after our fight, after you left, I had to carry around the guilt of our fight.
translation.es: Después de que te fuiste, tuve que cargar con la culpa de nuestra pelea.

translation.en: I had to pick up the pieces, put my life back together without you.
translation.es: Recoger las piezas. Rearmar mi vida sin ti.

translation.en: Well, you did a great job. Look around! There's nothing left of me!
translation.es: Te salió bien. No queda nada de mí aquí.

translation.en: I've been reduced to a box of knickknacks!
translation.es: Me redujeron a una caja de chucherías.

translation.en: After everything that's happened, I can't believe we're back to arguing.
translation.es: Después de lo que pasó, no puedo creer que discutamos.

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, I'm dead,
so you don't have to worry about arguing with me ever again.
translation.es: así que ya no discutirás más conmigo.

translation.en: You cannot bring that anger in here.
translation.es: No puedes traer esa ira aquí.

translation.en: Look, I… I met with my mom. I got Lisa a boyfriend.
translation.es: Mira, me reuní con mi mamá. Le conseguí un novio a Lisa.

translation.en: I've been talking to my dad even though he can't hear me.
translation.es: Le hablé a mi papá aunque no me oye.

translation.en: Isn't that enough? Do I have to go back?
Well, not if you don't want to.
Thank you.
Well, then, why don't I just walk you over to the elevator?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te llevo al ascensor entonces?

translation.en: When you get there, hit B for Below.
translation.es: Cuando llegues, presiona B de Bajar.

translation.en: - Very funny. I get it. - No, you don't.
translation.es: - Muy graciosa. Lo entiendo. - No entiendes.

translation.en: Why would you risk throwing away everything you've worked toward?
translation.es: ¿Por qué pones en riesgo todo por lo que trabajaste?

translation.en: And over an argument?
You were doing so well.
- You think I'm doing well? - Yes, I do. Don't you?
I don't know. Maybe.
I hoped I wouldn't have to tell you this, but here we are.
translation.es: Esperaba no tener que decirte esto, pero aquí estamos.

translation.en: If you really want this to end now, I can make that happen.
translation.es: Si realmente quieres que esto termine ahora, puedo hacerlo.

translation.en: But just know, if you leave the list unfinished,
translation.es: Pero debes saber que si dejas la lista sin terminar,

translation.en: then all the good you've been doing will be undone.
translation.es: todo lo bueno que hiciste se perderá.

translation.en: Everything?
Lisa?
My dad? Everything.
Oh, that's… that's terrible.
I can't… I can't do that to them.
- - So, you've made your decision?
Dad, I really need to talk--
- What is she doing here? - More tea?
Please.
I still can't believe you left your accounting practice to open a yoga studio.
translation.es: No puedo creer que hayas dejado la contabilidad por el yoga.

translation.en: You always joked about it, but I never thought you'd actually do it.
translation.es: Siempre bromeabas, pero nunca pensé que lo harías.

translation.en: I also joked about becoming a drummer in an '80s cover band.
translation.es: También bromeaba sobre ser baterista en una banda.

translation.en: - I remember that one. - This was a better lifestyle choice.
translation.es: - Sí, me acuerdo de eso. - Esta fue una mejor opción.

translation.en: It suits you.
You might not have said that a few days ago. This past year has been a challenge.
translation.es: No lo hubieras dicho hace unos días. Este último año fue duro.

translation.en: You know, Lisa visited me today.
I know this may sound nutty. During that visit, it…
translation.es: Sé que puede sonar loco, pero durante esa visita,

translation.en: it was almost as though Cassie were standing right beside me.
translation.es: fue como si Cassie estuviera a mi lado.

translation.en: I know what you mean.
She was a lot like you though.
Fearless, independent.
She'd dive headfirst into…  …any situation.
translation.es: Se lanzaba de cabeza a cualquier situación.

translation.en: But more than anything,
translation.es: Más que nada, era un cúmulo de energía

translation.en: she was this force of energy who lit up every room she entered.
translation.es: Más que nada, era un cúmulo de energía que iluminaba todo.

translation.en: After Lisa left, I, um…
translation.es: Después de que Lisa se fue…

translation.en: I had this overwhelming urge to see you.
translation.es: sentí una necesidad abrumadora de verte.

translation.en: I just need you to know how deeply sorry I am for walking out.
translation.es: Solo necesito que sepas cuánto lamento haberme ido.

translation.en: It wasn't how I saw life going, that's for sure.
translation.es: No era lo que me esperaba, eso seguro.

translation.en: Your leaving forced me to become a better man, a better parent,
translation.es: Tu partida me obligó a ser un mejor hombre, un mejor padre.

translation.en: even when she didn't want me to,
and I hope that in some way I was able to minimize whatever scars she had.
translation.es: Y espero, de alguna manera, haber minimizado sus cicatrices.

translation.en: Yeah, I know you did.
Look, I've kept you long enough.
Thanks for this.
You know, I don't know if it's the palo santo in the air or this dandelion tea talking,
translation.es: No sé si es el palo santo del ambiente o este té de diente de león,

translation.en: but I feel as though Cassie, wherever she is--
translation.es: pero siento que Cassie, esté donde esté…

translation.en: Brought us back together.
Mom, wait!
I forgive you.
So proud of you.
That felt good.
I can tell. I mean, you seem lighter.
Hey, so, um…
I need a favor. It's for a good cause, I swear!
translation.es: necesito un favor. Es bueno, lo juro.

translation.en: No swearing.
I didn't actually swear!
There's this bakery, and the owner seems like a really thoughtful person.
translation.es: Hay una confitería, y la dueña parece una persona amorosa.

translation.en: I know she's not on my list, but I think I can help her and help my dad.
translation.es: Sé que no está en mi lista, pero creo que puedo ayudarla a ella y a papá.

translation.en: We're not running a matchmaking service here.
I know, but they could both use a kind person in their life.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero les vendría bien alguien bueno.

translation.en: This could also be a thank- you to Emme for being such a good friend to Lisa since I've been gone.
translation.es: Y sería un agradecimiento a Emme por ser tan buena amiga con Lisa.

translation.en: I've never had anyone want to add to their list before.
translation.es: Nunca tuve a nadie que quiera agregar gente a su lista.

translation.en: I've also never had anyone like you before.
translation.es: Pero nunca tuve a nadie como tú.

translation.en: I'll allow it.
- Thank you! - Oh!
You're the best! Thank you! Thank you!
Yeah, but you're still on the same timeline. Tomorrow is your last day, Cassie.
translation.es: Pero sigues con el mismo tiempo. Mañana es tu último día, Cassie.

translation.en: I got this.
Perfect.
I can't leave it like this. It's a bakery, not Grandma's basement.
translation.es: No puedo dejarlo así. No es el sótano de una abuela.

translation.en: Are you behind this too, Cassie?
I like your faith in me, Dad.
translation.es: Me gusta tu fe en mí, papá.

translation.en: Morgan, mijita, are you dressed?
We don't wanna be late again.
Would you like some tea?
You can see me?
I saw you at the park too.
translation.es: También te vi en el parque.

translation.en: Aren't you scared?
You're my guardian angel.
translation.es: Eres mi ángel de la guarda.

translation.en: Ask your mom to read this to you.
translation.es: Pídele a tu mamá que te lea esto.

translation.en: I will.
This is our secret, okay?
Dr. Redding.
I wish Cassie was here.
I'm right here.
Hey.
Hey.
I do have a piece of you.
- It's from our very first puzzle. - Yeah.
It's, uh, it's kinda like my lucky charm.
translation.es: Es como mi amuleto de la suerte.

translation.en: I thought you were done with me.
translation.es: Pensé que estabas harta de mí.

translation.en: There are no grudges in the afterlife.
translation.es: No hay rencores en el más allá.

translation.en: Are there any here?
No. No, no. I do not wanna lose any more time with you.
translation.es: No. No quiero desaprovechar el tiempo que tengo contigo.

translation.en: - Neither do I. - No, no, no!
- I don't think I can explain an air hug. - Good point.
translation.es: - Será raro un abrazo al aire. - Cierto.

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay, so what's the problem? Why are you hesitating?
This is yours to lose.
Yeah, exactly.
Cassie, what if I don't get it? What then?
You'll survive, and you'll go on to something even better.
translation.es: Sobrevivirás y conseguirás algo aún mejor.

translation.en: No. No.
Look at me. Do you want this?
- Yeah. - Are you the best person for this job?
translation.es: - Sí. - ¿Eres la mejor para este trabajo?

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm not buying that yeah. You gotta try again. Are you the best person for this?
translation.es: No, debes intentarlo de nuevo. ¿Eres la mejor persona para esto?

translation.en: Yeah! I am the best person for this!
Yes! There's my strong friend! Life is too short to be fearful.
translation.es: ¡Eso es! La vida es muy corta para tener miedo

translation.en: Yeah, Cassie, I eat, I sleep, I drink this job.
translation.es: Sí, Cassie, como, duermo y respiro este trabajo.

translation.en: If I got this job, I'd crush it so hard, they'd name a freaking fossil after me.
translation.es: Lo haría tan bien que le pondrían mi nombre a un maldito fósil.

translation.en: - I would-- - Use that energy and go sign up!
Right! Sign up first. Dominate second.
- Yes. -
Oh, I've created a monster.
I love it.
Phew. Bam, bam. Good luck.
Hi.
I've heard nice things about you, Lisa.
translation.es: He oído grandes cosas de ti, Lisa.

translation.en: - Thanks. - I'm glad you decided to interview. And last too.
translation.es: Me alegra que te presentaras. Y de última.

translation.en: That's a bold move.
Shows the competition you're not worried about who came before.
translation.es: Muestra que no te preocupa quién vino antes.

translation.en: Oh, um, I didn't plan that--
Modesty's a myth that was sold to women a long time ago.
translation.es: La modestia nos la vendieron a las mujeres hace siglos.

translation.en: Be proud of your work.
Why paleontology?
I love digging in dirt,
translation.es: Me encanta cavar en la tierra.

translation.en: and I hated when people told me that it wasn't a proper career for a lady.
translation.es: Y odiaba que la gente me dijera que no era una carrera para una mujer.

translation.en: But, uh, mostly, I found it comforting studying what is real.
translation.es: Pero más que nada, me resultó reconfortante estudiar lo que es real.

translation.en: With fossils, it's like this tangible connection to the past, you know?
translation.es: Los fósiles son una conexión tangible con el pasado, ¿sabe?

translation.en: But, uh, now I've…
I've started learning from what I…
I can't see.
translation.es: de lo que no puedo ver.

translation.en: - Bye. - Bye.
- Bye. - See you.
Cassie?
- I got it! I got it! -
- I got the job! I got it! - You got it!
Thank you so much for the push. I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.es: Muchas gracias. No podría haberlo hecho sin ti.

translation.en: - It was all you. - No, I can't even believe I did it.
translation.es: - Fuiste tú. - No puedo creer que lo hice.

translation.en: - Um, I can! - This is, like, the best day of my life.
translation.es: - ¡Yo sí! - ¡Es el mejor día de mi vida!

translation.en: - So proud of you! - Thank you.
So, are you gonna come to Emme's tonight? I'm bringing Max.
translation.es: ¿Vendrás a lo de Emme esta noche? Llevaré a Max.

translation.en: I wouldn't miss it.
You made it!
Thank you so much for coming.
Excuse me. Hello.
I think I'm in the right place?
translation.es: - No sé si es el lugar correcto. - Si viniste a la fiesta, sí.

translation.en: If you're here for the party, then yes, you are. I'm Emme.
translation.es: - No sé si es el lugar correcto. - Si viniste a la fiesta, sí. Soy Emme.

translation.en: Would you like a homemade fortune cookie?
- Don't mind if I do. -
- You don't need to look any further. - Oh.
I guess this is the right place.
translation.es: Supongo que es el lugar correcto.

translation.en: How did you hear about my little soiree?
Honestly, my home was filled with your fliers.
translation.es: Mi casa estaba llena de volantes.

translation.en: No explanation. I have my suspicions, but no one would believe them.
translation.es: No hay explicación. Tengo sospechas, pero nadie las creería.

translation.en: Well, since we're being honest, my shop didn't look like this when I closed up last night.
translation.es: Ya que somos sinceros, mi tienda no se veía así cuando cerré anoche.

translation.en: I woke up this morning, and voilà.
translation.es: Me desperté esta mañana y voilà.

translation.en: I've got my suspicions too.
Someone's either looking out for us, or we need to get our locks changed.
translation.es: Alguien nos cuida o tenemos que cambiar las cerraduras.

translation.en: Can I get you a green tea?
- I've got sencha, matcha-- - Matcha?
Of course.
- What did you say your name was again? - Howard.
- Some people call me Howie. - Howard. It means strong heart.
translation.es: - Algunos me dicen Howie. - Howard. Significa corazón fuerte.

translation.en: Well, that went better than expected.
translation.es: Eso fue mejor de lo que esperaba.

translation.en: It is fascinating the many ways that people can make a living, isn't it?
translation.es: Me fascina ver las muchas formas en que la gente se gana la vida.

translation.en: - Look at that. - Come on.
Okay.
I'd really love to do gluten and dairy- free.
translation.es: Quisiera hacer cosas sin gluten y sin lácteos.

translation.en: That's a new development.
Come on. I'll introduce you.
Hey, look.
- Hi, Mr. Garcia. - Lisa!
- Hi. - Oh!
- What are you doing here? - I could ask you the same.
- Welcome to the party. - Hi, Emme! Hi!
translation.es: - Bienvenida a la fiesta. - Hola, Emme.

translation.en: She's one of my regulars. And I suspect is some of the reason I had this makeover.
translation.es: Es una de mis clientes. Y sospecho que la responsable del cambio de imagen.

translation.en: If only I knew how you got in here.
Well, I'll never tell.
So this is Max. He's, um,
my…
Boyfriend. Hi.
- Uh, wait, sorry. Is that cool? - One hundred percent.
translation.es: - Espera, lo siento. ¿Está bien? - Sí, totalmente.

translation.en: And how do you two know each other?
Lisa and my daughter were best friends.
translation.es: Lisa y mi hija eran mejores amigas.

translation.en: - What? Are you Cassie's dad? - Yeah.
I've heard a lot about her.
Um, I just have to make a call. I'll be right back.
translation.es: Debo hacer una llamada. Ya vuelvo.

translation.en: - All right. - Okay.
Someone has been busy. Are you still playing Cupid?
translation.es: Alguien estuvo ocupada. ¿Sigues jugando a Cupido?

translation.en: Can I help it if their paths crossed?
You still can't talk to him, huh?

translation.es: pero todo esto me hace entender…

translation.en: you were the ones helping me.
I'm not… I'm not ready to lose you again.

what about me?

Cassie,
you know I don't pick favorites.

Like, how can this be real? Is this real? Are you real?
Yes, I am.

I was volunteering in a disaster relief area when disaster struck again.

Val was in the angel committee that sent me straight up.

This is gonna sound really weird,
